DOC.brief_title: Canadian eCLIPs™ Safety Feasibility Study Protocol
DOC.detailed_description: With endoluminal stent/device implantation technique treat intracranial aneurysms conjunction embolic coil , neurovascular device place across aneurysm neck , act bridge prevent coil protrude parent artery . Stenting may allow safely achieve high pack density coil . These effect may improve rate complete aneurysm occlusion enhance durability coil treatment . The eCLIPs™ device manufacture Evasc Medical Systems Corp. high density 'leaf ' implant across bifurcation aneurysm neck anchor one branch artery bifurcation may provide improved bifurcation aneurysm treatment allow high pack density embolic coil implant behind eCLIPs™ device eCLIPs™ device combination embolic coil may reduce recurrence/retreatment rate increase rate complete aneurysm occlusion .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Only patient follow characteristic eligible study entry : 1 . Patient whose age 18 80 year old 2 . Patient unruptured , saccular , intracranial aneurysm recurrent aneurysm , arise bifurcation neck length ≤ 6mm aneurysm size 535mm 3 . Patient aneurysm arise bifurcation artery least one two branch artery vessel diameter 2.0mm 3.25mm 4 . Patient understands nature procedure capacity provide inform consent . 5 . Patient willing onsite 30 day , 6month , followup evaluation per standard clinical practice . Patients follow characteristic eligible study entry : 1 . Patient present intracranial mass currently undergo radiation therapy carcinoma head neck region . 2 . Patient International Normalized Ratio ( INR ) ≥ 1.5 . 3 . Patient serum creatinine level ≥104 µmol/L time enrolment . 4 . Patient platelet count ˂100x103 cells/mm3 know platelet dysfunction time enrolment 5 . Patient known cardiac disorder , likely associate cardioembolic symptom AFIB ( atrial fibrillation ) 6 . Patient condition opinion treat physician would place participant high risk embolic stroke 7 . Patient known allergy nickeltitanium metal 8 . Patient known allergy aspirin , heparin , ticlopidine , clopidogrel 9 . Patient life threaten allergy contrast ( unless treatment allergy tolerate ) 10 . Patient inappropriate anatomy demonstrate angiography due severe intracranial vessel tortuosity stenosis , intracranial vasospasm responsive medical therapy . 11 . Patient currently participate another clinical research study . 12 . Patient previous intracranial stenting procedure associate target aneurysm . 13 . Patient unable complete require followup . 14 . Patient pregnant breastfeeding . 15 . Patient participate drug study within last 30 day .
